name: Backrooms Found Footage Game
description:
Play Backrooms Found Footage on the Play Store









Backrooms Found Footage Game Teaser Trailer (Backrooms Game) Real simulation of the backrooms found footage and discover backrooms level 0. Backrooms Found Footage. The game is first-person, based on the Backrooms, the game is a simulated experience into the world of the backrooms, that hunted by the creepy backrooms level 0 enemy. and your goal is to find a way to escape from the backrooms if you can!




High fidelity graphics: the game contains some high graphics with great performance over 30fps+ on low-end mobile phones and more than 60+ fps on high-end phones.

A real simulation of the backrooms found footage level 0 Smooth game controllers: the player controls more smoothly and is very responsive on any device type. A smart AI and very responsive: the NPCs were designed in the game as realistic as possible, and very responsive to the player behaviors during the gameplay.

Puzzles and mysteries: the game contains a great number of puzzles and mysteries for the player to solve.
A responsive world to the player: the player's behaviors during the gameplay has an impact on the game world and the NPCs around it.

VHS Look effect



Move: WSAD
Sprint: Shift
Interact: E
Jump: Space

★★★★★★ If you want to experience the backrooms level 0, play now Backrooms Found Footage. It is recommended to play with headphones for a better experience. Let us know what you thought in the comments!

★★★★★★  Follow us for more upcoming games
